________________________________

From: Legal Affairs [mailto:legal_affairs@loanalliance.com] 
Sent: Friday, March 16, 2007 12:31 AM

immediately (IMC) 2nd attempt
Importance: High

16,
2007

 

SENT VIA EMAIL AND REGISTED MAIL

 

 

RE: Copyright / Trademark Infringement Notice - DMCA takedown immediately

 

Domain Name:     e-loanweb.com
Registrar:       Spot Domain LLC
 
Expiration Date: 2008-06-06 00:00:00
Creation Date:   2005-06-06 07:27:49
 
REGISTRANT CONTACT INFO
E-loanweb.com
Kathy Yates
2415 East Camelback Road Suite 700 PMB#131
Phoenix
AZ
85016
US
Phone:         +1.6026243441 
Fax:           +.6026243118 
Email Address: sales@e-loanweb.com
 

Server Data

IP Address:

67.15.94.77 

IP Location:

- Everyones Internet 

 

 

 

Dear Theplanet.com,

 

Loan Alliance Inc. has recently discovered that the operator(s) of http://www.
e-loanweb.com (the "Website") is blatantly violating our web property
www.imortgagecentral.com intellectual property rights. Loan Alliance Inc. provides
this notification of infringement pursuant to the Digital Millennium Copyright Act
(the "DMCA"). The Website violates www.imortgagecentral.com
<http://www.imortgagecentral.com/>  rights in several different ways:

 

1.      Your clients copying and distribution of the ENTIRE Website listed at
e-loanweb.com , or any part of the Website, is copyright infringement against our
web property badcreditalliance.com under United States Copyright law.  As we are
sure you are aware, Federal law, specifically Section 106 of the Copyright Act (17
U.S.C.
